physical_examinations.vital_signs: Within normal limits for her age
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Weight: 44 kg; neurological, head, neck, cardiopulmonary, abdominal, skin, extremity, and lymph node findings were normal. Mental status examination significant for withdrawn and confused appearance, blunted affect, paucity of speech, psychomotor slowing, and impaired thought process related to delusional beliefs and paranoia.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: The patient exhibited a gradual change in symptom severity, transitioning from vague symptoms to increasing psychotic manifestations over the course of 1 year.
